ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I'm Alkan, 21 years old and a German-, Turkish and English-speaking frontend developer from Vienna. Motivated by the limitless possibilities in IT, I am passionate about creating visually appealing and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT.LOCATION: I am flexible in terms of my working environment, so I can work effectively both on site in the office in Vienna and remotely.
ABOUT.MOTIVATION: I am open to new tasks and am always looking for new challenges to consolidate and constantly expand my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT.CREATIVE: In my job, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem solving. I pride myself on my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. In this way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILLS.ENTHUSIASM_FOR_LEARNING: Reveal enthusiasm for learning new technologies and frameworks.
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: Along the way, I have worked on various projects, learning and successfully utilizing a range of front-end technologies and concepts. I am open to new technologies and methodologies to continuously improve my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILLS.CONTACT_ME: Please feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding my existing knowledge.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.SUBLINE: Explore a selection of my work here – interact with projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

POLLO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
POLLO.DESCRIPTION: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.

POKEDEX.TITLE: Pokedex
POKEDEX.DESCRIPTION: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE: Alkan really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
TESTIMONIALS.NAME: V. Schuster

TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE: Alkan always brought fresh ideas to the table and helped us overcome tough challenges. His creativity really made a difference in the project.
TESTIMONIALS.NAME: Robert

TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE: Alkan was incredibly reliable and technically strong. He solved issues before they even became problems. A true asset to the team.
TESTIMONIALS.NAME: Hasan

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.QUESTION: Got a Problem to solve?
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION:
Get in touch with me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you,
getting to know your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT.CALL: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
